modify_description: In step 61, changed ExecutionAgent from a text-only response to calling the run_code tool with code_to_run as a list type (schema expects string type, causing parameter type mismatch)
The run_code tool returned a TypeError indicating the parameter type error
Updated steps 62-69 to reflect the tool parameter error in analysis and instructions, while maintaining the request for valid dataset access

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
causality_chain: step61: run_code called with code_to_run as list (expected string) → tool returns TypeError → agent cannot verify dataset access → FinalAgent infers wrong root cause reason
